createTransaction

public void createTransaction(java.lang.String firstName,
                              java.lang.String lastName,
                              java.lang.String customerID,
                              java.lang.String employeeName,
                              java.lang.String employeeID,
                              double taxPercent)
This creates a "current transaction" to work on.

Parameters:
firstName - the first name of the customer account.
lastName - the last name of the customer account.
customerID - the customer's membership card number.
employeeName - the first name of the employee that initially handled the transaction.
employeeID - the employee's id.
taxPercent - the percent the tax amount is as a double.

This adds/saves the current transaction to the database.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the transaction has not been paid for.
